meanings.sent1: She is the buxomest girl in our class.
meanings.sent2: The actress wore the buxomest dress at the award show.
meanings.sent3: The buxomest pumpkin at the fair won first prize.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as buxomest as a bubbling brook.
meanings.sent5: The buxomest flowers in the garden bloomed brightly.

meanings.sent1: That is the buxomest cat I have ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The buxomest tree in the forest provided ample shade.
meanings.sent3: The buxomest cake at the party disappeared quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the buxomest ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The buxomest clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows.
